name: Asad
Review: A wonderful franchise director to work along side who is passionate and humble, with strong experience in Trades to share his knowledge and develop our team. Customer base is diverse, fun to interact with and open to teaching you about the intricacies of their individual trade.

name: Asad
Review: On top of talking to other users, we looked online at the ratings of different sites and tools. This allowed us to take into account an even wider audience base, even those we didn’t have a chance to talk to personally.

name: Asad
Review: We checked sites such as Home Depot, Lowe’s, and Amazon to see what their users thought. Obviously, all online reviews are not reliable, but it does give a good general overview about many users’ experiences with the brands.
